forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind 6 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun graces the sky with a predominantly clear demeanor, inviting residents and visitors alike to step outside and savor the moment. Temperatures hover gently around sixty-six degrees, nudging downwards to a charming sixty-four by afternoon. The west-southwest breeze adds a playful touch, swirling between nine and twenty-two miles per hour, lending an invigorating edge to the air, with gusts occasionally reaching twenty-eight. As the day unfolds into evening, the sky will turn mostly clear, suggesting a cozy atmosphere, perfect for gatherings or solitary reflection.

Amidst the city’s iconic skyline, the absence of fog paints a delightful picture of clarity, though the delicate marine layer may lurk at the fringes, revealing itself only in the distant horizon. For those venturing out today, the crispness of the wind suggests that a light jacket would be a prudent choice, especially as twilight approaches and the temperature dips to around fifty-eight. Whether embarking on a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or unwinding with a good book in one of the city's many parks, today belies the fog of winter, presenting a day ripe with potential and calm.
